description:
[h1]This mod adds 4 new items which use lasers to unleash total annihilation![/h1]
All of these items use Plasma Batteries as a power source, which can be crafted in the craftbot.

[b]Thanks to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2816900681]Questionable Mark's Modded Craftbot Recipes[/url], they're also craftable in survival![/b]

[h1]Credits[/h1]
[list]
    [*][b]Vajdani[/b] - Scripting, animation
    [*][b]Dart Frog[/b] - Handheld Laser Cutter model, thumbnail help
    [*][b]DriVer[/b] - Laser Pistol model
[/list]
name: Laser Tools
